atom.description: Search results are returned within 200 milliseconds for queries against a catalog of up to 100,000 products
observableOutcomes: Search response time is under 200ms at p95
Results are returned even under peak load conditions
atom.reasoning: Derived from search-performance.e2e-spec.ts: the test seeds the database with 100,000 product records and measures query response times across 1,000 search requests. The p95 latency is asserted to be below 200ms. A separate load test scenario runs 50 concurrent search requests to verify the system does not degrade under contention. This atom captures a quantifiable performance contract with clear measurement boundaries.
atom.sourceTestName: should return search results within 200ms at p95 for 100k products
